name: PinkOball - Dating Alyssa
description:
Heyho, you funky sexy person!

Your date Alyssa is waiting for you at your favorite bar.
Have a nice conversation with her!
... if you can hit the right answers, that is...

CONTROLS: Just press your mouse and watch the ball bounce.
Oh, and... you can play ONLY ONCE  💘💘💘

Have a fun date, and stay funky,
Dez & Oni
